DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the clinical and radiographic success rate of Miniature pulpotomy with Mineral Trioxide Aggregate (MTA) in primary molars.
DOC.brief_title: Success Rate Evaluation of Miniature Pulpotomy With MTA in Primary Molars
DOC.criteria: healthy people(without any systemic disease) teeth : no clinical or radiographic evidence of pulp degeneration the possibility of proper restoration of the teeth teeth : excessive bleeding from the exposure site internal root resorption interradicular and/or periapical bone destruction swelling or sinus tract
